Database - Class in com.advantage.dbutils
Prerequisite for MySQL - Installation of mysql and supported version of mysql.jconnector.java.

Initializes class with default port, Integrated Security Enabled, username/password are set to null

Database(String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class com.advantage.dbutils.Database
Integrated Security is set based on sUser value and use the default port.

Note: Recommended to use this constructor.
